releaseNotes:
1. Upgraded Gate Pay for smoother payments and a richer lifestyle.
2. Enhanced the onboarding process for Bots with visuals and animations to guide beginners.

Gate is dedicated to providing you with a better user experience. You are welcome to submit feedback or tickets to give suggestions. Thank you for your support!
description:
Gate is a trusted cryptocurrency exchange offering secure and reliable trading for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and over 3,500 cryptocurrencies. Backed by 12 years of experience and trusted by over 39 million users worldwide, Gate delivers a feature-rich platform for crypto enthusiasts.  
  
Comprehensive Exchange: Buy Any Token You Need
Trade BTC, ETH, XRP, DOGE, ADA, PEPE, SOL, SUI, LINK, DOT, KAS, SHIB, AVAX, NEAR, UNI, TRUMP, MELANIE, ELON, TON, JUP, PYTH, WIF, JASMY, APT, AXL, STRK, BROCOLLI, XRP, TUT, and over 3,500 other digital assets seamlessly. 
All-in-One Exchange: Top Products All in One Place
• Spot Trading:
Access trending assets, tokens, and coins like TON, SOL, MEME, BRC20, AI, Layer2, TRON ecosystem, DeFi tokens, and NFTs. Enjoy deep liquidity, wide variety, and lightning-fast order execution.

•  Futures Trading:
Trade perpetual and delivery contracts with 0-fee orders and exclusive tools for new users, including simulated trading and free point cards.

• Alpha:
Gate Alpha is a leading on-chain asset trading platform that integrates the advantages of CEX and DEX. With one-click access to cross-chain assets, the widest token coverage, and minute-level listing speed, users get a first-mover advantage as they trade. By holding and trading, users earn Alpha Points, which can be used to join token airdrops, TGE subscriptions, and limited-time events. Every trade grows your points and unlocks more benefits.

•  Web3:
Your go-to portal for Web3 with decentralized wallets, trading, NFT marketplaces, Task Plaza, Swap, Inscription Zones, and more. Access Web3 tools effortlessly under one platform.

• Launchpool: 
Stake GT, USDT, ETH and other major assets to earn new project tokens. Multi-token support combines high APR with flexibility, allowing your assets to grow while generating income.

• Candydrop: 
Complete simple tasks such as trading, deposits, or inviting friends to earn ""candy"" and enter lucky draws for new project tokens. Zero barriers, fun and frequent events, with generous rewards.

• HODLer: 
By holding just 1 GT, you will automatically receive multiple project airdrops. No need to lock tokens or take extra actions. Ultra-low threshold, easy returns on holdings.

• Launchpad: 
Join early-stage quality project token offerings and capture first-mover advantages. Strict project screening ensures quality, while fair participation mechanisms protect user rights. Your early ticket to the next big project.

• Earn: 
A wide range of financial products, including Simple Earn, Auto-Invest, Dual Investment, Quant Fund, and Crypto Loan. Staking also features curated projects, enabling BTC, ETH, and GT staking with high APR. VIP users enjoy additional rewards.

•  Bots:
Access advanced bots like spot grid, infinite grid, futures grid, margin grid, spot martingale, arbitrage strategies, and smart rebalancing tools to automate trading and optimize performance. 

•  Copy Trading:
Sync trades in real-time with experienced traders for both spot and futures markets. Achieve up to 99.99% portfolio sync accuracy to mirror top-performing strategies.
- 24/7 Comprehensive Security Protection:
Gate prioritizes 24/7 security with comprehensive asset protection and compliance measures. As the first exchange to commit to 100% reserves, Gate guarantees transparency with Merkle tree and zero-knowledge proof technologies.  
- The First Exchange to Commit to 100% Reserves:
With $12.02B+ in surplus reserves, users can verify their funds at any time on the 100% Reserves Page, ensuring the highest level of fund safety and transparency in the industry.
Top-Quality Experience: 24/7 Customer Support
Enjoy 24/7 customer support to address any questions or issues promptly. Reach us anytime via email at support@gate.com. 

Join Our Community
- X: https://x.com/gate_io
- Telegram: https://t.me/gate_official_bot/
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gateioglobal
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/GateioCrypto
